abstract: Glen McLeod Cooper Johnson (born Glen McLeod Cooper Stephens; 23 August 1984) is an English footballer, who plays as a defender for Liverpool and the England national team. Johnson has previously played for West Ham United, Millwall, Chelsea and Portsmouth. He has also been capped 50 times by the national team.
